message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $95?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $97.50
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $92?
I'm not willing to go much lower than that. I can do $94.50
I understand that you're not willing to go much lower, but I'm really close to my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
